name: ChickTech Game Jam: A Jolly Scary Christmas
name_original: ChickTech Game Jam: A Jolly Scary Christmas
description:
ChickTech Game Jam: A Jolly Scary Christmas is a game developed by ashleynicollette. It came out on 19-12-2015.
ChickTech Game Jam: A Jolly Scary Christmas is available on Web. The game is sold via itch.io.
